text: David Greenlee is an American voice actor and actor best known for his portrayals of the nerdy hall monitor Dwight in seasons two through five of the 1982 television series Fame and Mouse in the fantasy series Beauty and the Beast. He was a champion on Password Plus in 1979. ==Filmography== ===Movies=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
